string(CONCAT _CMD
  "\"${Python3_EXECUTABLE}\" "
    "\"$<TARGET_PROPERTY:compiler_gym__envs__llvm__make_specs,LOCATION>\" "
    "\"$<TARGET_FILE:compiler_gym__envs__llvm__service__compiler_gym-llvm-service>\" "
    "\"$@\"")
set_command_pythonpath(COMMAND "${_CMD}" RESULT_VAR _CMD)

  OUTS "specs.py"
  COMMAND "${_CMD}"
